articles.title: It Must Be Nice to Be a West Village Girl - The Cut
articles.description: Thanks to women like Kit Keenan and Serena Kerrigan, NYC’s West Village neighborhood has been transformed into a fabulous theme park for a new generation to live out their Sex and the City fantasies.

articles.title: 60-Hour Dance Sessions, Simulated Sex, and Ketamine: Inside the World of Hardcore VR Ravers - WIRED
articles.description: VR Clubbing has exploded since Covid-19 lockdowns, with enthusiasts doing drugs and finding friends and love in an inclusive environment. But some say the convenience is making it harder to control their vices.

articles.title: Expedition 33 Is Increasing in Popularity with Each Successive Week - Push Square
Your TV's USB port has a forgotten benefit that can make an old system feel new again - ZDNET
articles.description: Updating your TV's firmware can improve performance, unlock new features, and squash bugs — and you can do it offline using just a USB drive.

articles.title: Hypothermia hits prisoner in unheated cell in 3rd episode of ‘Death County, PA’ - PennLive.com
articles.description: The third episode of the podcast “Death County, Pa.”, was released Monday, continuing the story of a years-long investigation into deaths at a Pennsylvania jail.

articles.title: Doug Bowser Reiterates The Importance Of Diversity Within Nintendo - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "we strive to have a diversity that reflects our players"
